entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
